name: EZDFP WORDPRESS PLUGIN
author: Quang Dinh

sections.description:
EZDFP WordPress plugin simplifies integration of Google DFP Ads into your WordPress site.
EZDFP is designed for non-programmers. You can insert DFP ads into your website and manage your ad campaigns without doing any programming. EZDFP provides 3 main modules: 1. inventory management 2. campaign management 3. ad targeting management

All configurations and management are done via easy web UI interface. Relationships between ad inventory-campaigns-creatives-targeting are all visually shown. EZDFP was designed to simplify the confusing process of configuring DFP ads. We hope that this tool will help you. Thanks.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Requirements: you must have both a Google DFP account and an EZDFP account to use this widget

  1. Download the EZDFP widget zip file (ezdfp-widget.zip) at ezdfp.com/download
  2. Install the EZDFP widget into WordPress by uploading the ezdfp-widget.zip file into WordPress
  3. Activate the EZDFP WordPress widget
  4. Login EZDFP widget to connect to your EZDFP account
sections.faq:
• Do I have to have a Google DFP account to use EZDFP? Yes
  • Do I have to have a WordPress site to use this EZDFP WordPress plugin? yes
  • Is the pricing plan FREE? yes EZDFP is free for use with one WordPress site
  • Do I need to know programming to use EZDFP? no
  • Is my DFP data saved in my Google DFP account? yes
  • Can I manage ad campaigns from my EZDFP account? yes
  • Can I manage creatives from my EZDFP account? yes
